total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the number 1 in the input grid.
Q2: Notice that the pattern of 1s forms a square shape in the input grid.
Q3: Identify the center of the square shape formed by the 1s.
Q4: Notice that the center of the square shape is empty (0) in the input grid.
Q5: Identify the size of the square shape formed by the 1s.
Q6: Notice that the size of the square shape is 5x5 in the output grid.
Q7: Identify the pattern of the number 1 in the output grid.
Q8: Notice that the pattern of 1s forms a cross shape in the output grid.
Q9: Identify the center of the cross shape formed by the 1s.
Q10: Notice that the center of the cross shape is filled (1) in the output grid.
Q11: Identify the size of the cross shape formed by the 1s.
Q12: Notice that the size of the cross shape is 5x5 in the output grid.
Q13: Identify the transformation from the square shape to the cross shape.
Q14: Notice that the transformation involves changing the 0s in the center of the square shape to 1s and the 1s in the corners of the square shape to 0s.
Q15: Apply the transformation to the input grid to generate the output grid.
